name: AI Mock Interview
desc: Integrated video recording using the Webcam package, and employed React-Speech Hook to convert spoken answers into text, enhancing the user experience

name: TechLearn Hub
desc: Developed a dynamic Ed Tech platform serving 50+ students, providing students with seamless functionalities for course Purchase, Reviews, Transaction History tracking, and an efficient Cart management system

name: BookQuest Platform
desc: Expanded the BookQuest Web Application, which features a dynamic ebook library with over 20 titles spanning various genres, offering seamless purchase, access to the PDF of ebook after purchase.

name: Razorpay Clone
desc: Developed a Razorpay Clone using ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, and MongoDB, enabling users to make payments and manage transactions.

name: Password Generator
desc: Developed a Password Generator using ReactJS, enabling users to generate strong and secure passwords based on their preferences.

name: Weather App
desc: Developed a Weather App using ReactJS, enabling users to search for weather information based on location.
